author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, fix two missed instances of including
the defunct id.h in the libsvn_fs_base implementation.
* libsvn_fs_base/bdb/txn-table.c
* libsvn_fs_base/util/fs_skels.c

author: jpieper
msg: Fix reading from deltified streams in FSFS when the buffer passed to
stream_read is smaller than the delta window.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(rep_read_contents): Only read in more data from the deltified
stream if we have exhausted our current buffer.

author: jpieper
msg: Fix various bugs in FSFS revealed by the test framework.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/tree.c
(copy_helper): Pass the canonicalized path to dag_copy, since it
ends up directly in a revision file.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/dag.h
(svn_fs__dag_copy): Change docstring to indicate FROM_PATH must be
canonicalized.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/dag.c
(svn_fs__dag_copy): Use the copyfrom path passed in, rather than the
path of the copied node.  The copied node could have been part of
a moved subtree, in which case it's created path was misleading.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(read_change): The read_length_line sometimes returns a 0 length
line, sometimes returns EOF at file end.  Check for both cases.

author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, get all the tests to pass except for the
(arguably unfair) unopened filesystem object test in fs-test.c.
* build.conf: Reflect move of FS tests to libsvn_fs_base.  Fix
libsvn_fs dependencies so it doesn't get rebuilt each time.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_base/fs.c (base_create, base_open): Move the
BDB version and already-open check to before we set the fsap_data
field, or the already-open check will fail.
* subversion/libsvn_fs/fs_loader.c
(get_library_vtable): Enable the "base" FSAP name.
(write_fsap_name): Don't try to make the FS directory here.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_fs_base/key-test.c,
subversion/tests/libsvn_fs_base/fs-test.c,
subversion/tests/libsvn_fs_base/changes-test.c,
subversion/tests/libsvn_fs_base/skel-test.c,
subversion/tests/libsvn_fs_base/strings-reps-test.c,
subversion/tests/fs-helpers.c:
Internal headers now live in libsvn_fs_base, not libsvn_fs.

author: ghudson
msg: In fs-abstraction branch, move libsvn_fs tests to new libsvn_fs_base
test directory, since all but one of them are for the internals of
the base implementation.
* tests/libsvn_fs: Delete.
* tests/libsvn_fs_base: Add, renamed from tests/libsvn_fs.
